tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Nats made me so still home that I forgot the fear of my tooth pain and the treatment to follow. Also it's so important to hear the clear version of what's happening to your teeth and with so much patience.

I am bowler over and am very happy to find this clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Yesterday was my third visit and i find her to be a great doctor. She is very confident and was kund to explain to me in details about her observations about my oral condition. She is extremely reasonable and honest. The thing which strikes me most about her is the confidence and to me thats comes from sheer knowledge about the subject.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had my braces done from here and Dr. Anupam did an exceptional job. It’s been almost ten years and have never had any issues.
Dr. Natalia did my fillings and they are the cleanest pair of fillings I have seen. 
Extremely friendly doctors with a gentle touch and regard for the patient. They know what’s best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Natalia Sinha was very sweet talking to. Before starting the treatment she explained v well to us  She studied all r medical files so patiently nd told us the process. Dr Natalia is v gentle nd affectionate  Appreciable. I would definately recommend everyone for dental treatment. She is too good in her profession

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Dr Natalia is a superb dentist with the genuine heart of a healer. *** ***** *** ****** ** * ****** ** **** ** **** ****** My teenage son had been advised  complex and prohibitively expensive treatments by other consultants; however I was fortunate to encounter Orion and Dr. Natalia, and now 2 sittings later all the issues are resolved with minimal invasive procedure, barely any pain, almost no medication and loads of care for the long term health of the patient. All this for a reasonable fee. We highly recommend Dr. Natalia and Orion as a sureshot answer to your dental issues. Grateful to have been directed here. Thanks very much.

tags: None
review:
Absolutely fantastic experience. I found Dr. Natalia to be both confident and competent. Very few people engage with patients the way she did - explaining the problem, the line of treatment, how long it would take and next steps. During the procedure, she would encourage me by saying I am doing very well and keep checking how I was doing.
The music in the background and the informal banter made the whole experience very relaxing.

tags: None
review: *** ******* ** * ****** ******, I am very very impressed with her quick decicive judgement on patient. She completely cured my 84 years old ma-in-law who was sufferering from worst mouth ulcer for last 6 years. I will always be indebted to her. Thank you Natalia.

tags: None
review: I had 4 appointments with Dr. Natalia Desilva for a root canal treatment. She is a great doctor, always making sure I wasn't feeling any pain. Explaining me in details what the problem was about, and how she would address it was very helpful. Besides, she was always time. I would definitely recommend Dr. Natalia Desilva to anyone looking for a comprehensive, skilled and gentle doctor.

tags: None
review: Dr DeSilva is the friendliest dentist I have met. She is a thorough professional! Would highly recommend her!

review: Very kind and polite, *** **** ******* ** made me forget my childhood nightmares of visiting a dentist as i was always scared of anaestesia injection but eversince i visited her its all gone she knows how to do the job.. i highly recommend her

review: the clinic is clean and well maintained. Dr was professional and attentive. I appreciated the care that was given and the promptness of the service.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Natalia is extremely proffesional as well as friendly and polite  .She explains her diagnose and procedures very well .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Natalia diagnosis is good and his behavior is also satisfactory and she described the problem in detail. We will definitely recommend this Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Patient-friendly approach by Dr Silva ensured we will be connecting with her more often in the future. She took time to explain the procedure (my husband got his cavity filling done) and the way forward in dental care. She made him feel at ease and gave him the confidence on tackling the issue: crucial factors on evaluating any physician’s expertise. Thank you Dr Silva! We wish you the best.

tags: None
review: Doc was very Supportive. ...She makes the patient very comfortable and explains thinga very well....
